name: places-api
description: Lambda function to retrieve places from Here API

scripts.test: cd src/places/ && npm install && node_modules/.bin/jest && cd -
scripts.test:cov: cd src/places/ && npm install && node_modules/.bin/jest --coverage && cd -
scripts.package: cd src/places && npm install --prod && cd - && sam package --template-file src/template.yaml --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name places  --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides

author: Gaston Pisacco
